findings.title: Two Functions Missing onlyOwner
findings.description: Several functions can benefit from the `onlyOwner` modifier.

findings.title: Unnecessary Loss of Precision
findings.description: Minor loss of precision due to division before multiplication

findings.title: Complex logic bug in pre-purchase validation that may result in a stalled sale stage
findings.description: A complex logic bug exists in the `_preValidatePurchase` function of the `TokenSale` contract, preventing the early switching from one sale stage to the next when no more contributions can be made to the current stage.
